title: Voting Period
description: A voting period for job board voting. Only one voting period may be in Ongoing state at a time.

state.description: Voting period state. Only one period may be Ongoing at a time.

jobVotes.description: List of jobs with their associated votes. Each pilot may only vote for one job per voting period.

jobId.description: UUID of an Active Job at the time of voting period creation

votes.description: Array of Pilot UUIDs representing pilots who have voted for this job. Each pilot can only appear once across all jobVotes in this period.

oneOf.description: ISO 8601 date-time string indicating when voting ends
Null indicates infinite duration (no end time)

endTime.description: DateTime when voting ends, or null for infinite duration

$comment:
Only one voting period may have state 'Ongoing' at a time.
Pilots may only vote for one job per voting period (enforced in code).
When a voting period ends, it must be set to Archived state.
Job UUIDs reference jobs.json - display must handle deleted jobs gracefully.
Pilot UUIDs reference pilots.json - display must handle deleted pilots gracefully.
endTime is nullable - null means infinite duration.
